  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:S377_4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>S377_4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Cell signalling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zelle Signalisieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Signalisation de cellules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinalizar da pilha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnalazione delle cellule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σηματοδότηση κυττάρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El señalar de la célula</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This unit explains the general principles of signal transduction and specifically, how even the simplest organisms can detect and respond to events in their ever-changing environment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Science and Nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">cell signalling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">dynamic cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Proteins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">receptors</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit erklärt die allgemeinen 
Grundregeln von Signal transduction und spezifisch, wie sogar die 
einfachsten organismen auf Fälle in ihrer überhaupt-ändernden 
Umgebung entdecken und reagieren können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité explique les principes généraux du
transduction de signal et spécifiquement, comment même les 
organizations les plus simples peuvent détecter et répondre aux 
événements dans leur environnement jamais-changeant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade explica os princípios gerais do 
transduction do sinal e especificamente, como mesmo os organismos os 
mais simples podem detectar e responder aos eventos em seu ambiente 
sempre-em mudança.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità spiega i principii generali del 
transduction del segnale e specificamente, quanto persino gli 
organismi più semplici possono rilevare e rispondere agli eventi nel 
loro ambiente mai-cambiante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα εξηγεί τις γενικές αρχές της μεταγωγής
σημάτων και συγκεκριμένα, πόσο ακόμη και οι απλούστεροι 
οργανισμοί μπορούν να ανιχνεύσουν και να αποκριθούν στα γεγονότα 
στο συνεχώς μεταβαλλόμενο περιβάλλον τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad explica los principios generales del 
transduction de la señal y específicamente, cómo incluso los 
organismos más simples pueden detectar y responder a los 
acontecimientos en su ambiente siempre-que cambia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Natur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zelle Signalisieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dynamische Zelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Proteine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Empfänger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et nature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">signalisation de cellules</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
